tagme_info.description: The tagme_info tag is used for setting all configuration parameter necessary to interact with the tagme server.

url.description: The TagME URL related to annotation operation

url_rel.description: The TagME URL related to relatedness computation

token.description: The D4Science Service Authorization Token. The user has to do a subscription to get it

language.description: Tag used to specify in which language have been written the documents to annotate

epsilon.description: This parameter can be used to finely tune the disambiguation process. You browse the site https://sobigdata.d4science.org/web/tagme/tagme-help to get more information

include_wikicategory.description: Tag used to include within the response the categories list of the wikipedia pages.

url4pmids.description: The url used to download a list of new pmid insert in the pubmed database

retmax.description: This is a parameter used to get the max number of pmids per query. I suggest you to increase the value only if your driver machine has more then 8 GB of RAM. You have to know that if this value is high then your driver will download many titles and abstract per query. So, it could cause an out of memory state.

retstart.description: This is a parameter used to specify from which index of the vector will be start the download function

url4abstract.description: The url used to download the title and abstract of the new articles

end_update_date.description: Upper bound of the date range used to limit a search result by the date. The general date format is YYYY/MM/DD, YYYY/MM or YYYY. If this field is set to 3000, it will specify the today data.

alpha.description: The wid1 and wid2 degree will be raised to this value

top.description: We only consider the top n associations for each wid1. The default value is 1000

newDocuments_path.descrizione: The hdfs path in which are stored all the json files containing the new documents' abstract and title to annotate

allDocuments_path.description: The hdfs path in which are stored the json file containing all the Pubmed documents' title and abstract until june 2017

DocumentsAnnotations_path.description: The hdfs path in which are stored the annotations related to the new documents downloaded from Pubmed

categories_path.description: The hdfs path in which are stored the parquet files containing all wikipedia biology categories.

pmids_wiki_ids_path.description: The hdfs path in which are stored the association pmid-wid

wiki_ids_spot_path.description: The hdfs path in which are stored the association wid-spot

w_matrix_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the w_matrix (DT-Hybrid)

wid1_wid2_path.description: The hdfs path in which are stored the parquet files containing the widi-widj association. where widi and widj are two wiki id of two different terms obtained during the annotation procedures

tagme_relatedness.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the relatedness between two wiki ids

disgenet_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the disgenet tsv file containing diseases information

disease_ontology_path.description: The hdfs path where the disease ontology is stored

disease_enhancer_path.description: The hdfs path where the disease enhancer database is stored

drugbank_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the drugbanck csv file containing drugs information

pharmkb_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the pharmkb csv file containing drugs information

hgnc_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the hgnc txt file containing genes information

ensembl_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the ensembl file containing genes information

civic_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the civic file containing genes information

lnc_pedia.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the lncpedia's gtf files containing lnc information

mirCode_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the mircode's txt file containing lnc information

mirbase_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the mirBase's txt files containing miRNA information

mirCancer_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the mirCancer's txt file containing miRNA information

mirTarBase_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the mirTarBase's csv file containing miRNA information

HMDD_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the HMDD's txt file containing miRNA information

RefSeq_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the RefSeq's fna files containing mRNA information

UniProtKB_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the UniprotKB file containing Protein information

string_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the aliases, names of the protein as well as the file containing the whole string network

PathBank_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the PathBank csv files containing Pathways information

Reactome_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the Reactome txt files containing Pathways information

Panther.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the Panther txt files containing Pathways information

go_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the go obo file containing ontology information

enzyme_path.description: The hdfs path in which is stored the csv file containing enzyme information

network_data.description: The hdfs path in which will be stored the network data
